product_name: Nantucket Bike Basket Company Cisco Handlebar Basket - Classic
long_description: The classic-shape Cisco bike basket is made from strong and durable rattan. It will dress up your bike and carry your farmer's market purchases. Leather straps attach the basket to your bike's handlebar. Rolled rim is extra durable.
short_description: The classic-shape Cisco bike basket is made from strong and durable rattan. It will dress up your bike and carry your farmer's market purchases.
